trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application is unable to connect to the first application instance.
trans-unit.target: 當單一執行個體 (Instance) 應用程式的後續執行個體無法連接到第一個應用程式執行個體時，會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A single-instance application differs from a normal application in that only one instance of the application can be running at a time.
trans-unit.target: 單一執行個體的應用程式與從一般應用程式中，只有一個執行個體的應用程式可以執行一次。

trans-unit.source: When a subsequent application instance starts, it attempts to contact the first instance application to pass its command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 後續的應用程式執行個體啟動時，它會嘗試連絡第一個執行個體應用程式，將其命令列引數傳遞。

trans-unit.source: If the first instance cannot be contacted, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> is raised in the subsequent application instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法連絡第一個執行個體，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException>中後續的應用程式執行個體將會引發。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic Application Model does not provide any context information in the exception.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 應用程式模型不提供任何例外狀況中的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A single-instance application differs from a normal application in that only one instance of the application can be running at a time.
trans-unit.target: 單一執行個體的應用程式與從一般應用程式中，只有一個執行個體的應用程式可以執行一次。

trans-unit.source: When a subsequent application instance starts, it attempts to contact the first instance application to pass its command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 後續的應用程式執行個體啟動時，它會嘗試連絡第一個執行個體應用程式，將其命令列引數傳遞。

trans-unit.source: If the first instance cannot be contacted, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> is raised in the subsequent application instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法連絡第一個執行個體，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException>中後續的應用程式執行個體將會引發。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> inherits from <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> 繼承自 <xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定的屬性<xref:System.Exception>物件下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)

trans-unit.source: The `message` string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，包含有關擲回之例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object describing the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> object that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 導致目前例外狀況的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <see langword="Catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，則會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="Catch" /> 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值如果傳遞到建構函式，則為 null 參考<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ApplicationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.ApplicationException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The `inner` reference.
trans-unit.target: `inner`參考。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字串。
